ngMultiTranscludeReplace
directive in module ng-directives-utils.multiTransclude

Description

register cloneLinking(clone) to the manager. This will replace the current element with the passing transclude element. If there is no transclude passing, current element will be removed.

Usage

as element:
<ng-multi-transclude-replace
       [ng-multi-transclude-replace="{string}"]>
</ng-multi-transclude-replace>
as attribute
<ANY ng-multi-transclude-replace
     [ng-multi-transclude-replace="{string}"]>
   ...
</ANY>

Parameters

ParamTypeDetails
ng-multi-transclude-replace
(optional)
string

ng-multi-transclude directive name, if not passing will treat as the default one
